name: APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Self-Test Started (SYSLOG)
APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Self-Test Passed (SYSLOG)
APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Input Power Failed (SYSLOG)
description: UPS: On battery power in response to an input power problem. 0x0109

patterns.value_re: UPS: On battery power in response to an input power problem. 0x0109

name: APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Input Power Low (SYSLOG)
description: UPS: Compensating for a low input voltage. 0x010B

patterns.value_re: UPS: Compensating for a low input voltage. 0x010B

name: APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Input Power OK #1 (SYSLOG)
description: UPS: No longer on battery power. 0x010A

patterns.value_re: UPS: No longer on battery power. 0x010A

name: APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Input Power OK #2 (SYSLOG)
description: UPS: No longer compensating for a low input voltage. 0x010C

patterns.value_re: UPS: No longer compensating for a low input voltage. 0x010C

name: APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Battery Power Low #1 (SYSLOG)
description: UPS: The battery power is too low to support the load; if power fails, the UPS will be shut down immediately. 0x0107

patterns.value_re: UPS: The battery power is too low to support the load; if power fails, the UPS will be shut down immediately. 0x0107

name: APC | AOS | Environment | UPS | Battery Power Low #2 (SYSLOG)
description: UPS: The battery power is too low to continue to support the load; the UPS will shut down if input power does not return to normal soon. 0x010F

patterns.value_re: UPS: The battery power is too low to continue to support the load; the UPS will shut down if input power does not return to normal soon. 0x010F
